00003 ns::import('hygia.libs.validator.Validator');
00004 ns::import('hygia.libs.io.Response');
00005 ns::import('hygia.libs.exception.ValidatorException');
00006 
00012 class ValidatorContentType extends Validator implements IValidator {
00013 
00014     private $sValidator;
00015     private $aValidationErrors;
00016 
00017     public function __construct($sValidator) {
00018         $this->sValidator = $sValidator;
00019         $this->aValidationErrors = array();
00020     }
00021 
00029     public function run(Response $oResponse) {
00030 
00031         if (!$oResponse instanceof Response) {
00032             throw new ValidatorException('Response is not of type Response');
00033         }
00034 
00035         // get the content-type header
00036         $sContentType = $oResponse->getHeaderValue('Content-Type');
00037         $bValid = (int) $this->sValidator == $sContentType;
00038         if (!$bValid) {
00039             $this->aValidationErrors[] = 'Content-Type validator failed. Expected: ' . $this->sValidator . '. Got: ' . $sContentType;
00040         }
00041         return $bValid;
00042     }
00043 
00049     public function getValidationErrors() {
00050         return $this->aValidationErrors;
00051     }
00052 
00053 }
